div.div: Wash. & Jeff. Coll. vs. College of Wooster
at Wooster, Ohio | John P. Papp Stadium

tr.td: Wooster wins the coin toss, defers to the second half.
Tyler Gerwig kickoff 49 yards to the W&J16, out-of-bounds, W&J ball on W&J35.
Dion Wiegand rush for loss of 4 yards to the W&J31 (Matt Osolinski).
Matt Bliss pass complete to Dan Lucas for 11 yards to the W&J42 (Petey Jeffy).
Matt Bliss pass complete to Steven Licht for 7 yards to the W&J49, 1ST DOWN W&J (Brandon James;John Battaglia).
Dion Wiegand rush for 51 yards to the WOO0, 1ST DOWN W&J, TOUCHDOWN, clock 13:48.
Eric Eberle kickoff 58 yards to the WOO7, out-of-bounds, WOO ball on WOO35.
